text: its boughs lightly dusted with fresh snow
standing as a dark green sentinel against a snowy landscape
icicles hanging from its lower branches
its foliage appearing even darker and denser in the cold air
providing shelter for birds and small animals against the winter chill
its cones now mature, some perhaps releasing seeds onto the snow
a resilient splash of green in the otherwise stark winter scenery
frost outlining each needle or scale in the cold morning light
its strong form resisting the bite of winter winds
